title: statistics on reports/bans
body:
since in the past riot has posted statistics on how q times work and skill differences etc. i am curious on the statistics on the amount of reports players make and how much of it has actually been dealt with.

chat restrictions, temporary bans, permanent bans all that good stuff.

at the moment its just riot telling us every report is being analyzed but as a long time player in this game i have 0 faith riot has bothered to focus on this part of the game at all.

riot pls

replies.body: Riot has no focus on the lower Elo, basically they are a company that care about making money, not the enjoyment of their customer base. thats how big business stay big business, they work on the pro scene, give no shits about the rest. I blame tencent for that, but still, a little showing that they remeber where they came from would be nice.

i know that and i think most of us know that but no one cares and we just rot in this cesspool of dog shit.

pls riot show us some proof you are doing things to change this game for the better and not just tell us to read the sticky post.

all riot does is tell us 'we are working and sorry for what happened to you' but that's the end of that.

in other words, too bad deal with the shit experience and the 1000 shit experiences you had and the 1000000 shit experiences coming your way...we will be polite because we are above you sheep players and there's nothing you can do about it'

WELL

we can all band together and refuse to buy skins and bundles so riot loses profit. if we can disrupt how much money they earn they will surely look at the situation a tiny little bit more

After playing this game roughly 5 years, I have made the presumption based my experience and others alike. Riot is only trying to please the hardcore competitive scene in comparison to the casual scene. I could go on all day about how unfulfilling this game has become.

pretty much sure the company has some issues with its system , 5 min afk is punishable for 5 games in low q? r there staff members mom dead?and when i ask for an answer they just dodge my quest and finally ban me cause they fking dont know how to answer it

ever since they removed tribunal the only way i know reports are taken seriously are when i get the occasional popup after a game saying "thanks for the report, a player has been punished"
and even then i dont know WHO, out of the many many reports that get sent in.
